data.name: Aztecs
data.bs:
• villagers carry +5
  • Military units (except Monks) created 15% faster
  • +5 Monk hit points for each Monastery technology
  • Start with +50 gold

data.name: Britons
data.bs:
• Town Centers cost -50% wood upon reaching the Castle Age
  • Foot archers (excluding Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age,
    +1 in Imperial Age (for +2 total)
  • Shepherds work 25% faster

data.name: Byzantines
data.bs:
• Buildings (except gates) have +10% HP in Dark Age, +20% HP in Feudal Age,
    +30% in Castle Age, +40% in Imperial Age.
  • Spearman, skirmisher and camel lines cost 25% less
  • Fire Ships attack 20% faster.
  • Imperial Age costs -33%.
  • Town Watch is free.

data.name: Celts
data.bs:
• Infantry move 15% faster.
  • Lumberjacks work 15% faster.
  • Siege weapons reload 20% faster.
  • Sheep cannot be stolen if within one Celt unit's line of sight.

data.name: Chinese
data.bs:
• Start game with 3 extra villagers but -50 wood and -200 food.
  • Technologies cost -10% in Feudal Age, -15% in Castle Age,
    -20% in Imperial Age.
  • Town Centers support 10 population instead of 5.
  • Town Center +5 LOS
  • Demolition Ships have +50% HP

data.name: Franks
data.bs:
• Foragers work 25% faster
  • Castles are 25% cheaper.
  • Cavalry has +20% HP.
  • Farm upgrades are free (Mill is required to receive bonus).

data.name: Goths
data.bs:
• Infantry cost 35% less (starting in Feudal Age)
  • Infantry have +1 attack against buildings.
  • Villagers have +5 attack versus wild boar.
  • Hunters carry +15 meat.
  • +10 to population limit in Imperial Age.

data.name: Huns
data.bs:
• Houses are not required to support population, start game with -100 Wood.
  • Cavalry Archers cost -10% in Castle Age, -20% in Imperial Age.
  • Trebuchets are 35% more accurate.

data.name: Japanese
data.bs:
• Fishing Ships have 2x HP and +2 pierce armor.
  • Fishing Ships work +5% faster in Dark Age, +10% in Feudal Age,
    +15% in Castle Age, +20% in Imperial Age.
  • Lumber Camps, Mining Camps, and Mills are 50% cheaper.
  • Infantry attack 25% faster (starting in Feudal Age).

data.name: Koreans
data.tb: Mangonel line minimum range reduced to 1 (from 3)
data.bs:
• Villagers have +3 line of sight.
  • Stone miners work 20% faster.
  • Guard Tower and Keep upgrades are free.
  • Towers (except bombard towers) have +1 range in Castle Age, +2 in Imperial Age.
  • Walls, gates, castles are built 25% faster, towers 5% faster

data.name: Mayans
data.bs:
• Start game with 1 extra villager, -50 food.
  • Natural resources last 15% longer.
  • Archers cost -10% in Feudal Age, -20% in Castle Age, -30% in Imperial Age.

data.name: Mongols
data.bs:
• Cavalry Archers reload 20% faster.
  • Light Cavalry and Hussars have +30% HP.
  • Hunters work 50% faster.

data.name: Persians
data.bs:
• Start game with +50 wood and food.
  • Town Center and Docks have 2x HP.
  • Town Centers and Docks operate +10% faster in Feudal Age,
    +15% in Castle Age, +20% in Imperial Age.

data.name: Saracens
data.tb: Foot archers have +2 attack bonus against buildings
data.bs:
• Market costs -75W
  • Market trade cost is only 5%
  • Transport Ships have 2x HP and carry capacity.
  • Galleys attack 20% faster.
  • Cavalry Archers have +4 attack bonus against buildings.

data.name: Spanish
data.bs:
• Villagers construct buildings 30% faster.
  • Blacksmith upgrades do not cost any gold.
  • Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (less reload time and more accuracy).
  • Hand Cannoneers and Bombard Cannons reload 15% faster.

data.name: Teutons
data.tb: Units are more resistant to conversion
data.bs:
• Monks have 2x healing range.
  • Towers can garrison 2x units (more arrows).
  • Murder Holes is free.
  • Farms cost 33% less.
  • Town Centers garrison +10 units (total 25), total amount of arrows +5 (max 16).

data.name: Turks
data.bs:
• Gunpowder Units have +25% HP
  • Gunpowder technologies cost 50% less
  • Chemistry is free
  • Gold miners work 20% faster
  • Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades are free

data.name: Vikings
data.bs:
• Warships cost -15% in Feudal/Castle, -20% in Imperial Age
  • Infantry have +10% HP in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle Age,
    +20% in Imperial Age
  • Wheelbarrow and Hand Cart are free

data.name: Incas
data.bs:
• Start with free llama
  • Villagers affected by blacksmith upgrades
  • Houses support 10 population
  • Buildings cost -15% stone

data.name: Indians
data.tb:
Camels +6 attack vs buildings,
Mamelukes and Camel Archers +5 vs buildings
data.bs:
• Villagers Cost -10% in Dark, -15% in Feudal, -20% in Castle, -25% in Imperial
  • Fishermen(villagers) work 15% faster and carry +15
  • Camels +0/+1 armor

data.name: Italians
data.bs:
• Advancing to the next age costs -15%
  • Dock techs cost -50%
  • Fishing ships cost -11W
  • Gunpowder units cost -20%

data.name: Magyars
data.bs:
• Villagers kill wolves in 1 strike
  • Melee upgrades (forging, iron casting, blast furnace) in blacksmith free
  • Scout line costs -15%

data.name: Slavs
data.tb: Military buildings (barracks, archery ranges, siege workshops and stables) provide +5 population
data.bs:
• Farmers work ~15% faster
  • Tracking free
  • Siege units from siege workshop 15% cheaper

data.name: Portuguese
data.bs:
• All units cost -15% gold (0.85*cost)
  • All ships 1.1*HP (+10%)
  • Get Feitoria

data.name: Ethiopians
data.bs:
• Receive 100F 100G upon advancing to next age
  • Pikeman upgrade free
  • Foot archers reload time *0.85 (-15%)

data.name: Malians
data.bs:
• Barracks units get +1 pierce armor per age
  • buildings (except Farms) wood cost *0.85 (15% cheaper)
  • Free Gold Mining

data.name: Berbers
data.bs:
• Villagers movement speed *1.1 (10% faster)
  • Ships movement speed *1.1 (10% faster)
  • Stable units cost *0.85 (15% cheaper) in Castle Age and *0.8 (20% cheaper) in Imperial Age

data.name: Burmese
data.tb: Relics visible on map (3x3 square, all visible)
data.bs:
• Free Lumbercamp upgrades
  • Infantry +1 attack per Age (starting in Feudal)
  • Monastery techs cost *0.5 (50% cheaper)

data.name: Khmer
data.bs:
• No buildings required to advance through Ages or unlock other buildings
  • Battle Elephants speed *1.15 (15% faster)
  • Villagers can garrison in Houses

data.name: Malay
data.bs:
• Advancing to ages 80% faster
  • Fish Traps cost -33%
  • Fish Traps provide unlimited food
  • Battle Elephants cost *0.70 (30% cheaper)

data.name: Vietnamese
data.bs:
• Reveal enemy positions at game start
  • Archery Range units +20% HP
  • Free Conscription
